activities.name: Get Count Of Records by Hour and Up from Snowflake

query.value:
@concat('Select
       time_slice(to_timestamp(EVENTTIME), 1, ''HOUR'', ''START'') as "START OF SLICE",
       UP,
       count(*) as "Number of records"
From "BLACKBIRD_EDR"."EDR"."',pipeline().parameters.streamname,'" 
WHERE  EVENTTIME >= ''',pipeline().parameters.startdate,''' AND EVENTTIME < ''',pipeline().parameters.enddate,'''
  group by "START OF SLICE", UP
  order by to_timestamp("START OF SLICE") asc')

dependsOn.activity: Get Count Of Records by Hour and Up from Snowflake

value.value: @replace(replace(replace(replace(join(activity('Get Count Of Records by Hour and Up from Snowflake').output.value,','),'}',''),'{"START OF SLICE":',''),'"Number of records":',''),'"UP":','')

SnowFlakeQuery.defaultValue: select * FROM \"BLACKBIRD_EDR\".\"EDR\".\"@src_table\" WHERE EVENTTIME >= \'@sp\' AND EVENTTIME < \'@ep\' AND UP = \'@up\'

source.query:
select SF_LOAD_TS_EST, RECORD_CONTENT from "MOBILITYCORELOCAL"."MSLOGS"."STREAM_SMF_PROD"
where (RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_interface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_pcfinterface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_procedure'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_pgw_procedure'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'pgwcc_interface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_pfcp_interface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_gtpcinterface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_udminterface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_chfinterface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.job = 'kube-state-metrics' 
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.job = 'pfcp' 
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.job = 'smfmonitor')
AND TO_DATE(SF_LOAD_TS_EST) >= TO_DATE('2023-01-01','yyyy-mm-dd')

select SF_LOAD_TS_EST, RECORD_CONTENT from "MOBILITYCORELOCAL"."MSLOGS"."STREAM_UPF_PROD"
where (RECORD_CONTENT:tags.job = 'pfcp'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'sess_mgr_control_plane_stats'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'sess_mgr_data_plane_stats'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'sess_mgr_intf_stats'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'sess_mgr_session_db_stats'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'sess_mgr_vpp_threads_cpu_utilization'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'pfcp_procedure'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'pfcp_protocol')
AND TO_DATE(SF_LOAD_TS_EST) >= TO_DATE('2022-10-20','yyyy-mm-dd')

activities.name: Copy Snowflake to RAW Kusto table

source.query:
select TO_TIMESTAMP(RAW_RECORD['@timestamp']) AS SF_LOAD_TS, RAW_RECORD from MOBILITYCORELOCAL.MSLOGS.STREAM_SMF_EVENT_TOADLS  
where substr(RAW_RECORD['kubernetes']['host'], 1, 7) in (select substr(SITE, 1, 7) from MOBILITYCORELOCAL.MSLOGS.SPOTLIGHT_SITES)
AND TO_DATE(SF_LOAD_TS) >= TO_DATE('2022-11-04','yyyy-mm-dd')

select SF_LOAD_TS_EST, RECORD_CONTENT from "MOBILITYCORELOCAL"."MSLOGS"."STREAM_SMF_PROD_TOADLS"
where (RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_interface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_pcfinterface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_procedure'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_pgw_procedure'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'pgwcc_interface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_pfcp_interface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_gtpcinterface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_udminterface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.appName = 'smfcc_chfinterface'
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.job = 'pfcp' 
OR RECORD_CONTENT:tags.job = 'smfmonitor')
AND TO_DATE(SF_LOAD_TS_EST) >= TO_DATE('2022-11-03','yyyy-mm-dd')

activities.name: Copy Snowflake to RAW Kusto table

source.query:
SELECT TO_TIMESTAMP(RAW_RECORD['@timestamp']) AS SF_LOAD_TS, RAW_RECORD FROM MOBILITYCORELOCAL.MSLOGS.STREAM_LOGS_FLUENTD_DEBUG_CSMF_RAW 
where substr(RAW_RECORD['kubernetes']['host'], 1, 7) in (select substr(SITE, 1, 7) from MOBILITYCORELOCAL.MSLOGS.SPOTLIGHT_SITES)
and TO_DATE(SF_LOAD_TS) >= TO_DATE('2022-11-08','yyyy-mm-dd')
